definition.name: Create GitHub App Token
definition.description: GitHub Action for creating a GitHub App installation access token
definition.author: Gregor Martynus and Parker Brown

inputs.name: app-id
inputs.description: GitHub App ID

inputs.name: private-key
inputs.description: GitHub App private key

inputs.name: owner
inputs.description: The owner of the GitHub App installation (defaults to current repository owner)

inputs.name: repositories
inputs.description: Comma or newline-separated list of repositories to install the GitHub App on (defaults to current repository if owner is unset)

inputs.name: skip-token-revoke
inputs.description: If true, the token will not be revoked when the current job is complete

inputs.name: github-api-url
inputs.description: The URL of the GitHub REST API.

inputs.name: permission-actions
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for GitHub Actions workflows, workflow runs, and artifacts. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-administration
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for repository creation, deletion, settings, teams, and collaborators creation. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-checks
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for checks on code. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-codespaces
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to create, edit, delete, and list Codespaces. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-contents
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for repository contents, commits, branches, downloads, releases, and merges. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-custom-properties-for-organizations
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and edit custom properties for an organization, when allowed by the property. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-dependabot-secrets
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage Dependabot secrets. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-deployments
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for deployments and deployment statuses. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-email-addresses
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage the email addresses belonging to a user. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-enterprise-custom-properties-for-organizations
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for organization custom properties management at the enterprise level. Can be set to 'read', 'write', or 'admin'.

inputs.name: permission-environments
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for managing repository environments. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-followers
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage the followers belonging to a user. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-git-ssh-keys
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage git SSH keys. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-gpg-keys
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage GPG keys belonging to a user. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-interaction-limits
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage interaction limits on a repository. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-issues
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for issues and related comments, assignees, labels, and milestones. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-members
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for organization teams and members. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-metadata
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to search repositories, list collaborators, and access repository metadata. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-administration
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage access to an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-announcement-banners
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage announcement banners for an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-copilot-seat-management
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for managing access to GitHub Copilot for members of an organization with a Copilot Business subscription. This property is in public preview and is subject to change. Can be set to 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-custom-org-roles
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for custom organization roles management. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-custom-properties
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for repository custom properties management at the organization level. Can be set to 'read', 'write', or 'admin'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-custom-roles
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for custom repository roles management. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-events
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view events triggered by an activity in an organization. Can be set to 'read'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-hooks
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage the post-receive hooks for an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-packages
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for organization packages published to GitHub Packages. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-personal-access-token-requests
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for viewing and managing fine-grained personal access tokens that have been approved by an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-personal-access-tokens
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for viewing and managing fine-grained personal access token requests to an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-plan
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for viewing an organization's plan. Can be set to 'read'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-projects
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage organization projects and projects public preview (where available). Can be set to 'read', 'write', or 'admin'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-secrets
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage organization secrets. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-self-hosted-runners
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage GitHub Actions self-hosted runners available to an organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-organization-user-blocking
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage users blocked by the organization. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-packages
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for packages published to GitHub Packages. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-pages
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to retrieve Pages statuses, configuration, and builds, as well as create new builds. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-profile
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage the profile settings belonging to a user. Can be set to 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-pull-requests
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for pull requests and related comments, assignees, labels, milestones, and merges. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-repository-custom-properties
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and edit custom properties for a repository, when allowed by the property. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-repository-hooks
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage the post-receive hooks for a repository. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-repository-projects
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage repository projects, columns, and cards. Can be set to 'read', 'write', or 'admin'.

inputs.name: permission-secret-scanning-alerts
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage secret scanning alerts. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-secrets
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage repository secrets. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-security-events
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to view and manage security events like code scanning alerts. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-single-file
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage just a single file. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-starring
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to list and manage repositories a user is starring. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-statuses
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token for commit statuses. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-team-discussions
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage team discussions and related comments. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-vulnerability-alerts
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to manage Dependabot alerts. Can be set to 'read' or 'write'.

inputs.name: permission-workflows
inputs.description: The level of permission to grant the access token to update GitHub Actions workflow files. Can be set to 'write'.
